markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Fire Jellyfish Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=706)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

While individually one of these fist-sized jellyfish is merely a nuisance, in great numbers, fire jellyfish can form into dangerous swarms. Bobbing in the water, they create a cloud of stinging tentacles. They were named in part for their bright coloration, but those who are stung by fire jellyfish learn the larger reason for their name—the pain of their stings is comparable to being burned alive.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Fire Jellyfish Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=706)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +10; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 13 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 155

**Immunities**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 9, piercing 9, poison 10, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 7, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 7

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 20 feet

**Agile Swimmer**   Fire jellyfish swarms use [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39).

**Burning Swarm** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 3d8 poison damage (DC 24 basic Reflex save) and is exposed to fire jelly venom.

**Fire Jelly Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** clumsy 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** clumsy 3 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-140" />
name: Fire Jellyfish Swarm
